item.description:
This month we're reading Water for Elephants by Sara Gruen. It's a highly acclaimed book that I'm sure you'll enjoy. One reviewer said "The circus, the Great Depression, a complex elephant, equally complex love, the mists and twists of memory articulated in the utterly winning voice of a very old man who's seen it all: these are the irresistible elements for Water for Elephants."

Have a great holiday and a happy new year! We'll see you all in January.

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: Brookline Book Club - January Meetup
